class.name: StepNormalizerBounds

javadoc.text: {@link StepNormalizer Step normalizer} bounds settings. They influence * whether the underlying fixed step size step handler is called for the first * and last points. Note that if the last point coincides with a normalized * point, then the underlying fixed step size step handler is always called, * regardless of these settings.
Do not include the first and last points.
Include the first point, but not the last point.
Include the last point, but not the first point.
Include both the first and last points.
Whether the first point should be passed to the underlying fixed * step size step handler.
Whether the last point should be passed to the underlying fixed * step size step handler.

javadoc.param: first Whether the first point should be passed to the * underlying fixed step size step handler.
last Whether the last point should be passed to the * underlying fixed step size step handler.

javadoc.text: Returns a value indicating whether the first point should be passed * to the underlying fixed step size step handler.
javadoc.return: value indicating whether the first point should be passed * to the underlying fixed step size step handler.

javadoc.text: Returns a value indicating whether the last point should be passed * to the underlying fixed step size step handler.
javadoc.return: value indicating whether the last point should be passed * to the underlying fixed step size step handler.
